actions.name: Play Video in Infuse
actions.description: Plays the video from the provided URL in Infuse.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL encoded URL of a video to be played in Infuse

parameters.name: x-success
parameters.description: A URL that opens once the video has been played.

parameters.name: x-error
parameters.description: A URL that opens if the playback of the video failed.
